name: Blackout: Sightless Home
description:
Welcome to 「Blackout : Sightless Home」
You woke up in the dark and old mansion.
Couldn't remember where you are and even who you are.
The only thought in your head was that you must "find the child."
A space where nothing is remembered and nothing can be seen properly.
If you are looking for the child, listen to the sounds of the place.
A faint sound of the music box may be heard in the dark.


「How to play」
- Play in a dark room with earphones or headset on.
- You must proceed with the game by judging the distance and direction based on the sounds you hear in both ears.


「Sightless Home」
- You will be trapped in an infinitely looping house.
- Keep in mind that all you can do is "follow the sound of the music box".
- The ghosts of the house are wandering to find you. If you see or hear them, run away.


※ Note : Data will not be saved if the game is closed.
※ Please note Black out is free to download and play, but some game items can be purchased for real money.
※ IOS 10.0 or above recommended.
※ Terms of Service - https://www.zzoozzoo.net/termsofservice.html
※ Privacy Policy - https://www.zzoozzoo.net/privacy.html
※ Support - contact@zzoozzoo.net
